name: @stream-io/stream-chat-css
description: Bundled CSS for Stream Chat web SDKs
author: GetStream

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && yarn bundle-sass && yarn copy-assets && yarn copy-styles
scripts.bundle-sass: echo '[34mℹ[0m Compiling scss files to css bundle' && sass src/styles/index.scss dist/css/index.css --style compressed && echo '[32m✓[0m Finished bundling css'
scripts.copy-assets: echo '[34mℹ[0m Copying assets to distributed directory' && cp -R src/assets dist/assets && echo '[32m✓[0m Finished copying assets'
scripts.copy-styles: echo '[34mℹ[0m Copying scss files to distributed directory' && cp -R src/styles dist/scss  && echo '[32m✓[0m Finished copying styles'
